ReportBundle.ReportXML: <Report ReportGID="f05d40e6-7026-499d-8d38-590ee05123ac" ReportUseType="2" ReportType="5" ReportName="Premix Feed Sheet" Description="Feed sheet for Premixes" CreatedDT="2012-10-17T12:08:56" ModifiedDT="2015-03-26T10:30:51.73" ModifiedBy="VAS" ConcurrencyTS="AAAAAAAdczg=" ReportVersion="1" />

ReportQuery.ReportQueryText:
<QueryBundle> <QueryText>select z.RecipeName ,z.Sequence ,z.IngredientName ,z.LocationName ,z.TargetAF_SQty ,z.TargetAF_MQty ,z.TargetAF_LQty ,z.EquipmentCapacityAF_SQty ,z.EquipmentCapacityAF_MQty ,z.EquipmentCapacityAF_LQty ,rt.RunningTotalAF_SQty ,rt.RunningTotalAF_MQty ,rt.RunningTotalAF_LQty ,z.EquipmentGID ,z.EquipmentNumber ,z.EquipmentName ,z.EquipmentName + ' - ' + z.RecipeName as 'EquipmentRecipe' ,cmp.CompanyName from ( select rp.RecipeGID ,rp.RecipeName ,ri.Sequence ,ii.InventoryItemName as 'IngredientName' ,li.LocationName ,eq.EquipmentGID ,eq.MaxMixCapacityAF_SQty * rp.DensityFactor * ri.IngPctOfAF as 'TargetAF_SQty' ,eq.MaxMixCapacityAF_MQty * rp.DensityFactor * ri.IngPctOfAF as 'TargetAF_MQty' ,eq.MaxMixCapacityAF_LQty * rp.DensityFactor * ri.IngPctOfAF as 'TargetAF_LQty' ,eq.EquipmentNumber ,eq.EquipmentName ,eq.MaxMixCapacityAF_SQty * rp.DensityFactor as 'EquipmentCapacityAF_SQty' ,eq.MaxMixCapacityAF_MQty * rp.DensityFactor as 'EquipmentCapacityAF_MQty' ,eq.MaxMixCapacityAF_LQty * rp.DensityFactor as 'EquipmentCapacityAF_LQty' from Recipe rp cross apply (select ri.* ,IngPctOfAF = ri.Quantity / SUM(ri.Quantity) over (partition by ri.RecipeGID) from RecipeInstruction ri where ri.Inactive = 0 and ri.RecipeGID = rp.RecipeGID) ri join Ingredient ing on ing.MadeByRecipeGID = rp.RecipeGID join InventoryItemLocation iil on iil.InventoryItemLocationGID = ri.InventoryItemLocationGID join InventoryItem ii on ii.InventoryItemGID = iil.InventoryItemGID join Location li on li.LocationGID = iil.LocationGID cross join (select eq.* ,le.LocationName as 'EquipmentName' ,qty.MaxMixCapacityAF_SQty ,qty.MaxMixCapacityAF_MQty ,qty.MaxMixCapacityAF_LQty from Equipment eq join EquipmentLocation el on el.EquipmentGID = eq.EquipmentGID join Location le on le.LocationGID = el.LocationGID join Company cmp on cmp.CompanyGID = le.CompanyGID join EquipmentType et on et.EquipmentTypeGID = eq.EquipmentTypeGID
cross apply (select eq_af.CMP_SML as 'MaxMixCapacityAF_SQty' ,eq_af.CMP_MED as 'MaxMixCapacityAF_MQty' ,eq_af.CMP_LRG as 'MaxMixCapacityAF_LQty' from dbo.GetSMLQuantities(eq.MaxMixCapacityOz, cmp.CompanyGID) eq_af) qty where et.OperationType in (0,1)) eq
where rp.Inactive = 0 and ri.Inactive = 0 ) z join Recipe rp on rp.RecipeGID = z.RecipeGID join Company cmp on cmp.CompanyGID = rp.CompanyGID
cross apply (select SUM(y.TargetAF_SQty) as 'RunningTotalAF_SQty' ,SUM(y.TargetAF_MQty) as 'RunningTotalAF_MQty' ,SUM(y.TargetAF_LQty) as 'RunningTotalAF_LQty' from ( select rp.RecipeGID ,eq.EquipmentGID ,ri.Sequence ,eq.MaxMixCapacityAF_SQty * rp.DensityFactor * ri.IngPctOfAF as 'TargetAF_SQty' ,eq.MaxMixCapacityAF_MQty * rp.DensityFactor * ri.IngPctOfAF as 'TargetAF_MQty' ,eq.MaxMixCapacityAF_LQty * rp.DensityFactor * ri.IngPctOfAF as 'TargetAF_LQty' from Recipe rp cross apply (select ri.* ,IngPctOfAF = ri.Quantity / SUM(ri.Quantity) over (partition by ri.RecipeGID) from RecipeInstruction ri where ri.Inactive = 0 and ri.RecipeGID = rp.RecipeGID) ri join Ingredient ing on ing.MadeByRecipeGID = rp.RecipeGID cross join (select eq.* ,le.LocationName as 'EquipmentName' ,qty.MaxMixCapacityAF_SQty ,qty.MaxMixCapacityAF_MQty ,qty.MaxMixCapacityAF_LQty from Equipment eq join EquipmentLocation el on el.EquipmentGID = eq.EquipmentGID join Location le on le.LocationGID = el.LocationGID join Company cmp on cmp.CompanyGID = le.CompanyGID join EquipmentType et on et.EquipmentTypeGID = eq.EquipmentTypeGID cross apply (select eq_af.CMP_SML as 'MaxMixCapacityAF_SQty', eq_af.CMP_MED as 'MaxMixCapacityAF_MQty', eq_af.CMP_LRG as 'MaxMixCapacityAF_LQty' from dbo.GetSMLQuantities(eq.MaxMixCapacityOz, cmp.CompanyGID) eq_af) qty where et.OperationType in (0,1)) eq where rp.Inactive = 0 and ri.Inactive = 0) y where y.RecipeGID = z.RecipeGID and y.EquipmentGID = z.EquipmentGID and y.Sequence <= z.Sequence) rt where (1=1)</QueryText> <PreQueryText /> </QueryBundle>
ReportQuery.SQLStatement:
select z.RecipeName ,z.Sequence ,z.IngredientName ,z.LocationName ,z.TargetAF_SQty ,z.TargetAF_MQty ,z.TargetAF_LQty ,z.EquipmentCapacityAF_SQty ,z.EquipmentCapacityAF_MQty ,z.EquipmentCapacityAF_LQty ,rt.RunningTotalAF_SQty ,rt.RunningTotalAF_MQty ,rt.RunningTotalAF_LQty ,z.EquipmentNumber ,z.EquipmentName ,z.EquipmentName + ' - ' + z.RecipeName as 'EquipmentRecipe' ,cmp.CompanyName from ( select rp.RecipeGID ,rp.RecipeName ,ri.Sequence ,ii.InventoryItemName as 'IngredientName' ,li.LocationName ,eq.MaxMixCapacityAF_SQty * rp.DensityFactor * ri.IngPctOfAF as 'TargetAF_SQty' ,eq.MaxMixCapacityAF_MQty * rp.DensityFactor * ri.IngPctOfAF as 'TargetAF_MQty' ,eq.MaxMixCapacityAF_LQty * rp.DensityFactor * ri.IngPctOfAF as 'TargetAF_LQty' ,eq.EquipmentNumber ,eq.EquipmentName ,eq.MaxMixCapacityAF_SQty * rp.DensityFactor as 'EquipmentCapacityAF_SQty' ,eq.MaxMixCapacityAF_MQty * rp.DensityFactor as 'EquipmentCapacityAF_MQty' ,eq.MaxMixCapacityAF_LQty * rp.DensityFactor as 'EquipmentCapacityAF_LQty' from Recipe rp cross apply (select ri.* ,IngPctOfAF = ri.Quantity / SUM(ri.Quantity) over (partition by ri.RecipeGID) from RecipeInstruction ri where ri.Inactive = 0 and ri.RecipeGID = rp.RecipeGID) ri join Ingredient ing on ing.MadeByRecipeGID = rp.RecipeGID join InventoryItemLocation iil on iil.InventoryItemLocationGID = ri.InventoryItemLocationGID join InventoryItem ii on ii.InventoryItemGID = iil.InventoryItemGID join Location li on li.LocationGID = iil.LocationGID cross join (select eq.* ,le.LocationName as 'EquipmentName' ,qty.MaxMixCapacityAF_SQty ,qty.MaxMixCapacityAF_MQty ,qty.MaxMixCapacityAF_LQty from Equipment eq join EquipmentLocation el on el.EquipmentGID = eq.EquipmentGID join Location le on le.LocationGID = el.LocationGID join Company cmp on cmp.CompanyGID = le.CompanyGID join EquipmentType et on et.EquipmentTypeGID = eq.EquipmentTypeGID
cross apply (select eq_af.CMP_SML as 'MaxMixCapacityAF_SQty' ,eq_af.CMP_MED as 'MaxMixCapacityAF_MQty' ,eq_af.CMP_LRG as 'MaxMixCapacityAF_LQty' from dbo.GetSMLQuantities(eq.MaxMixCapacityOz, cmp.CompanyGID) eq_af) qty where et.OperationType in (0,1)) eq
where rp.Inactive = 0 and ri.Inactive = 0 ) z join Recipe rp on rp.RecipeGID = z.RecipeGID join Company cmp on cmp.CompanyGID = rp.CompanyGID
cross apply (select SUM(y.TargetAF_SQty) as 'RunningTotalAF_SQty' ,SUM(y.TargetAF_MQty) as 'RunningTotalAF_MQty' ,SUM(y.TargetAF_LQty) as 'RunningTotalAF_LQty' from ( select rp.RecipeGID ,ri.Sequence ,eq.MaxMixCapacityAF_SQty * rp.DensityFactor * ri.IngPctOfAF as 'TargetAF_SQty' ,eq.MaxMixCapacityAF_MQty * rp.DensityFactor * ri.IngPctOfAF as 'TargetAF_MQty' ,eq.MaxMixCapacityAF_LQty * rp.DensityFactor * ri.IngPctOfAF as 'TargetAF_LQty' from Recipe rp cross apply (select ri.* ,IngPctOfAF = ri.Quantity / SUM(ri.Quantity) over (partition by ri.RecipeGID) from RecipeInstruction ri where ri.Inactive = 0 and ri.RecipeGID = rp.RecipeGID) ri join Ingredient ing on ing.MadeByRecipeGID = rp.RecipeGID cross join (select eq.* ,le.LocationName as 'EquipmentName' ,qty.MaxMixCapacityAF_SQty ,qty.MaxMixCapacityAF_MQty ,qty.MaxMixCapacityAF_LQty from Equipment eq join EquipmentLocation el on el.EquipmentGID = eq.EquipmentGID join Location le on le.LocationGID = el.LocationGID join Company cmp on cmp.CompanyGID = le.CompanyGID join EquipmentType et on et.EquipmentTypeGID = eq.EquipmentTypeGID cross apply (select eq_af.CMP_SML as 'MaxMixCapacityAF_SQty', eq_af.CMP_MED as 'MaxMixCapacityAF_MQty', eq_af.CMP_LRG as 'MaxMixCapacityAF_LQty' from dbo.GetSMLQuantities(eq.MaxMixCapacityOz, cmp.CompanyGID) eq_af) qty where et.OperationType in (0,1)) eq where rp.Inactive = 0 and ri.Inactive = 0) y where y.RecipeGID = z.RecipeGID and y.Sequence <= z.Sequence) rt where (1=1)
